mapper.insert:
insert into daily_trip values(0, #{trip_board_num}, #{reserve_stay_index}, #{daily_trip_start_address}, #{daily_trip_start_lngy}, #{daily_trip_start_latx}, #{daily_trip_via1_address}, #{daily_trip_via1_lngy}, #{daily_trip_via1_latx}, #{daily_trip_via2_address}, #{daily_trip_via2_lngy}, #{daily_trip_via2_latx}, #{daily_trip_via3_address}, #{daily_trip_via3_lngy}, #{daily_trip_via3_latx}, #{daily_trip_via4_address}, #{daily_trip_via4_lngy}, #{daily_trip_via4_latx}, #{daily_trip_via5_address}, #{daily_trip_via5_lngy}, #{daily_trip_via5_latx}, #{daily_trip_end_address}, #{daily_trip_end_lngy}, #{daily_trip_end_latx}, #{daily_trip_memo}, now())
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
